title: OPEC Secretary General welcomes new Iraqi Oil Minister
description: Vienna, Austria, 17 June 2020--OPEC Secretary General, HE Mohammad Sanusi Barkindo, held a webinar meeting with Iraqâ€™s new Oil Minister, HE Ihsan Abdul Jabbar Ismaael, to welcome the Minister to OPEC and discuss oil market developments and the outcome of the June Ministerial Meetings.
